content.rendered:
1/2 Off Rafting at AVA Right Now!

August is here, and the whitewater rapids summer fun is flowing at Arkansas Valley Adventures! If you have been too busy to enjoy the exhilarating experience AVA has to offer, the time has come to treat yourself to a once-in-a-lifetime adventure at the most amazing price around!

Our Why Wait? special (why wait in traffic on I-70 when you can be rafting down whitewater rapids instead??) is going on now. Simply buy one, get one ½ off on our Clear Creek Sunday afternoon 2:00 or later trips. Use these links to book a Clear Creek Beginner or Clear Creek Intermediate right now and enter the promo code “WHY WAIT.”

AVA is also offering 10% off all trips booked for dates August 15-September 30. This includes rafting/zipline packages, Arkansas River rafting trips, Clear Creek rafting trips and Upper Colorado River rafting trips. Valid on AVA-run trips.

You have waited long enough for the thrilling outdoor adventure only AVA can offer! With our Why Wait special and other generous AVA deals, why are you waiting?

http://www.pharmacablog.com/category/natural-product/
